description:
Florida's largest registry of skilled and compassionate caregivers enabling people of ages to maintain independence at home. CSI has 10,000+ caregivers and 19 offices statewide.

Program offers:
* Staffing Services
* Nursing Assessment
* One-hour Visits Available
* Live-In Care
* Respite Care
* Shower or Bed Bath Visit
* Medication Reminders
* Meal Preparation
* Housekeeping
* Transportation to DoctorGu00c7u00d6s Visits
* Alzheimer's & Dementia Care
* Licensed RNs & LPNs
* CNAs & HHAs
* Companion/Homemaker
* Spanish Speaking Available
* On Call Gu00c7u00f4 24/7 & Holidays
* Long Term Care Insurance Accepted
* Convenient Payment Options
name: CAREGIVER SERVICES, INC.
